selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the area of square C using the Pythagorean theorem.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to evaluate the expression derived from the Pythagorean theorem to find the area of square C.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the multiple-choice format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use format_final to return the answer as 'Answer: X' where X is the option label.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_pythagorean_tree
new_skill_specs.purpose: Interpret the Pythagorean tree diagram to determine the area of square C.
inputs: areas of squares A and B
edge_cases: Ensure correct mapping of areas to the diagram labels
Handle cases where diagram indicators are unclear
